headline: GTA Online
subtitle: GTA Online: Lowriders Now Available
content:
This latest update introduces Benny's Original Motor Works, the only garage in Los Santos specializing in Lowrider culture and customization. The update also features two brand new rides, plus new weapons, clothing, tattoos and much more.

Speak with Lamar for 8 new Contact Missions as he takes on the gangs to become king of the Los Santos Lowriders scene, or team up for 3 new vehicle-themed Adversary Modes.

For full details visit the Rockstar Newswire.
